sense.gloss: benefit, advantage, good, interests (e.g. of society)
grace (of God, Buddha, etc., esp. as attained through rightful actions, prayer, adherence to one's faith, etc.), blessing, miracle
advantage, point in favor, point in favour
to be effective, to take effect, to be good (for)
to be possible (to do, use, etc.), to be able to
disadvantage, handicap, drawback, inadvisability, inexpediency, loss
fondness for alcohol, person who is fond of alcohol, drinker
dominance (e.g. of left or right hand)
expensive money, dear money, high interest
